alert.note: Alert for Redwood; Yellow Medicine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 4:17PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Redwood and southeastern Yellow Medicine Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 416 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Cottonwood, or 10 miles northeast of Marshall, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported penny size hail near Cottonwood. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Echo around 435 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Redwood Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
